long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the Timesheets section of Hive, we can see the breakdown of hours for each resource. Sadly, the contrast of the input text vs the input background is too low. For Timesheet reviewers the low contrast creates an issue due to the difficulty when reading the numbers.

This is a simple extension that highlights input text whenever each input value is higher than 0.
